tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE flight_schedules (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_name VARCHAR(255),
    route_from VARCHAR(255),
    route_to VARCHAR(255),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE flight_schedule (
  flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_name VARCHAR(255),
  origin_airport VARCHAR(255),
  destination_airport VARCHAR(255),
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE airline (
  airline_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  country VARCHAR(255),
  headquarters_location VARCHAR(255),
  established_year INT
);

CREATE TABLE routes (
    route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    origin_airport_code CHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    destination_airport_code CHAR(3) NOT NULL,
    distance_km INT,
    duration_hours FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_id INT NOT NULL,
    route_id INT NOT NULL,
    departure_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    arrival_datetime TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (airline_id) REFERENCES airlines(airline_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (route_id) REFERENCES routes(route_id)
);

CREATE TABLE flights (
    flight_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    airline_id INT REFERENCES airlines(airline_id),
    departure_airport_code VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES airports(airport_code),
    arrival_airport_code VARCHAR(3) REFERENCES airports(airport_code),
    departure_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    arrival_time TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE Flight (
  flight_number INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_name TEXT,
  origin TEXT,
  destination TEXT,
  departure_time TIMESTAMP,
  arrival_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Route (
  route_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  airline_id INT,
  origin TEXT,
  destination TEXT,
  distance FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE Schedule (
  schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  flight_number INT,
  route_id INT,
  departure_date DATE,
  arrival_date DATE
);
